Developer Essentials.intent: Setup a Git repo and push code to GitHub
Developer Essentials.explanation: Initializes a local Git repo, links to remote, commits files, and pushes to GitHub.
Updates apt repo and installs Node.js and npm.

Debugging Templates.intent: Fix permission denied error in shell
Debugging Templates.explanation: Makes the script executable by adding execute permissions.

Security & Permissions.intent: Find and kill process running on port 3000
Security & Permissions.explanation: Lists process using port 3000 and kills it using its PID.
